Recent Projects

Improving monitoring of snowpack water resources

Developing a global dataportal system for CryoNET stations

TopoSAT: High resolution surface modelling of the Himalayan cryosphere with satellite data assimilation [2017-2018]

A Swiss National Science Foundation mobility grant (P2ZHP2_165435)

Data and monitoring tools for improved water resource management Afghanistan [2016]

A SEED project funded by the State Secretariat for Education, Research and Innovation/ ETH

A SEED project funded by the State Secretariat for Education, Research and Innovation/ ETH
